Package controller

Interface IKontrolleri

public interface IKontrolleri
Interface for the controller class of a budget/expense tracking application. This interface defines the main methods required to manage expenses, users, and categories.

  • Method Details

    • getKulut

      List<model.Kulu> getKulut(int kayttajaid)
      Retrieves a list of expenses for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      kayttajaid - The user ID for which to retrieve expenses.
      Returns:
      A list of expenses associated with the specified user.

    • getKulu

      model.Kulu getKulu(int kuluid)
      Retrieves a single expense by its ID.
      Parameters:
      kuluid - The ID of the expense to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The expense associated with the specified ID.

    • lisaaKulu

      void lisaaKulu(String nimi, double hinta, LocalDate paivamaara, model.Kategoria kategoria, model.Kayttaja kayttaja, String kuvaus)
      Adds a new expense to the application.
      Parameters:
      nimi - The name of the expense.
      hinta - The price of the expense.
      paivamaara - The date of the expense.
      kategoria - The category of the expense.
      kayttaja - The user associated with the expense.
      kuvaus - A description of the expense.

    • getKayttaja

      model.Kayttaja getKayttaja(int kayttajaid)
      Retrieves a user by their ID.
      Parameters:
      kayttajaid - The ID of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The user associated with the specified ID.

    • lisaaKayttaja

      void lisaaKayttaja(String nimi, double budjetti)
      Adds a new user to the application.
      Parameters:
      nimi - The name of the user.
      budjetti - The budget of the user.

    • getKayttajat

      List<String> getKayttajat()
      Retrieves a list of user names.
      Returns:
      A list of user names.

    • getKategorianimet

      List<String> getKategorianimet(String omistaja)
      Retrieves a list of category names for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      omistaja - The owner of the categories.
      Returns:
      A list of category names associated with the specified user.

    • getKategoria

      model.Kategoria getKategoria(String nimi, String omistaja)
      Retrieves a category by its name and owner.
      Parameters:
      nimi - The name of the category.
      omistaja - The owner of the category.
      Returns:
      The category associated with the specified name and owner.

    • paivitaBudjetti

      void paivitaBudjetti(int kayttajaID, double budjetti)
      Updates the budget for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      kayttajaID - The ID of the user whose budget will be updated.
      budjetti - The new budget value.

    • muokkaaKulua

      boolean muokkaaKulua(int id, Double summa, String nimi, String kuvaus)
      Modifies an existing expense.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the expense to modify.
      summa - The new amount for the expense.
      nimi - The new name for the expense.
      kuvaus - The new description for the expense.
      Returns:
      true if the expense was successfully modified, false otherwise.

    • muokkaaKategoriaa

      boolean muokkaaKategoriaa(int id, String nimi)
      Modifies an existing category.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the category to modify.
      nimi - The new name for the category.
      Returns:
      true if the category was successfully modified, false otherwise.

    • muutaKulunKategoria

      boolean muutaKulunKategoria(int kuluId, model.Kategoria uusiKategoria)
      Changes the category of an existing expense.
      Parameters:
      kuluId - The ID of the expense whose category will be changed.
      uusiKategoria - The new category for the expense.
      Returns:
      true if the category was successfully changed, false otherwise.

    • poistaKulu

      boolean poistaKulu(int id)
      Deletes an expense by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the expense to delete.
      Returns:
      true if the expense was successfully deleted, false otherwise.

    • poistaKategoria

      boolean poistaKategoria(int id, model.Kayttaja kayttaja)
      Deletes a category by its ID and user.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the category to delete.
      kayttaja - The user associated with the category to delete.
      Returns:
      true if the category was successfully deleted, false otherwise.

    • lisaaKategoria

      void lisaaKategoria(String nimi, String omistaja)
      Adds a new category to the application.
      Parameters:
      nimi - The name of the category.
      omistaja - The owner of the category.

    • getKategoriat

      List<model.Kategoria> getKategoriat(String omistaja)
      Retrieves a list of categories for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      omistaja - The owner of the categories.
      Returns:
      A list of categories associated with the specified user.

    • poistaKayttajanTiedot

      void poistaKayttajanTiedot(int kayttajanID)
      Deletes all data associated with a specific user.
      Parameters:
      kayttajanID - The ID of the user whose data will be deleted.

    • sendOstoslistaRequest

      String sendOstoslistaRequest() throws Exception
      Sends a request for a shopping list.
      Returns:
      A string containing the shopping list data.
      Throws:
      Exception - If there is an issue with the request.

    • getListModel

      model.ListModel getListModel()
      Retrieves the instance of ListModel associated with the controller. The ListModel contains shopping and reminder lists.
      Returns:
      the ListModel instance containing shopping and reminder lists
